Uses of Class
pathfinder.Segment

  • Packages that use Segment 
    Package Description
    pathfinder
    This package contains all classes related to the more specific case of finding the best path in a given grid.

    • Uses of Segment in pathfinder

      Fields in pathfinder with type parameters of type Segment 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.util.LinkedList<Segment> Individual.list_segments
      List of traversed segments.
      Methods in pathfinder that return types with arguments of type Segment 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.LinkedList<Segment> Grid.ValidSegments​(Point A)
      This is the interface central method.
      java.util.LinkedList<Segment> Grid2D.ValidSegments​(Point A)
      This method receives a point, and returns the linked list of valid segments for which the individual can travel.
      Methods in pathfinder with parameters of type Segment 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected boolean Individual.checkcycles​(Segment nextseg)
      This method receives a segment and checks if there is a cycle in the path.
      Constructor parameters in pathfinder with type arguments of type Segment 
      Constructor Description
      Individual​(MainSimulator m, java.util.LinkedList<Segment> list_segments)
      This method is the constructor of the Individual Class.
